name: heroku-init
description: 1. vscode extension - Material theme - Material icon theme - Prettier - bracket pair colorizer - Indent-rainbow - Auto rename tag - HTML CSS SUPPORT - json pretty printer(ctrl + shift + j)

scripts.client-build: cd client && npm ci && cp -r src build && cd ../
scripts.server-build: cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm run client-build && npm run server-build && cp -r client\build server\dist\build
